meanings.definition: A French stew typically made with lamb or mutton and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious navarin for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a bowl of navarin at the French restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The navarin looked so good that it almost seemed too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering navarin filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavors of the navarin lingered on my taste buds long after the meal.

meanings.definition: A type of dish or meal made with lamb or mutton and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: For dinner, we enjoyed a hearty navarin with tender lamb and fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The navarin was a perfect choice for a cozy family meal on a cold evening.
meanings.sent3: As a special treat, the children helped prepare the navarin for Sunday supper.
meanings.sent4: The colorful medley of vegetables in the navarin added a delightful twist to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The savory aroma of the cooking navarin wafted through the house, making everyone hungry.
